    public interface IDesignerHost
extends IJCOBridgeReflected, IServiceContainer, IServiceProvider
    The base .NET class managing System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost, System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a.
